channel.title: Vote for your favorite server!
channel.description:
You can now vote for your favorite server once an hour on the server status page:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
If it turns out to be popular, it may replace uptime as the default sorting method. Although now you can sort them however you want by clicking the headers of the table.
Tell me how you like it here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.msg3119129.html#msg3119129

item.title: Vote for your favorite server!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You can now vote for your favorite server once an hour on the server status page:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

If it turns out to be popular, it may replace uptime as the default sorting method. Although now you can sort them however you want by clicking the headers of the table.

Tell me how you like it here:
